# MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOptionType.legible

**Case**

Indicates a written language option is used.

## Declaration

```swift
case legible
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOptionType.audible**: Indicates an audible language option is used.
